feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.60.0
entry.content: This is a release that includes the missing dependency that 0.59.X didn't include

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.60.1
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add env var to disable automatic flow enabling on publish (#7953) @hazemadelkhalel

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: ignore project memebers associated with soft deleted projects (#7960) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: ensure the vendor navigation listener is set before resolving he configure method promise (#7956) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer and @hazemadelkhalel

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.60.2
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: support multiple mcps (#7734) @Gamal72

üß© Pieces

  • feat: tarvent piece (#7815) @DerekJDev

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: mcp flow migration (#7965) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: ensure the vendor navigation listener is set before resolving the configure method promise #7958 @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • refactor: simplify mcp tools db migrations (#7966) @hazemadelkhalel

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor(job-queue): skip throwing errors when repeatable job does not exist (#7964) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @DerekJDev, @Gamal72, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @dependabot, @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.61.0
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • fix(slack): expose actions and triggers (#7977) @kishanprmr
  • feat(zoho-desk): list tickets, create tickets and find contact actions (#7976) @kishanprmr
  • feat(jira-cloud): get attachment action (#7959) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • feat: update mcp instructions for claude (#7984) @abuaboud
  • fix: typo in note when testing piece webhook triggers (#7983) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: missing body in return response and wait for next webhook (#7982) @hazemadelkhalel

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore: sync connections on flows pushing/deleting to git (#7985) @hazemadelkhalel

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add mamiefurax as a contributor for plugin (#7978) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.62.0
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • fix(pipedrive): Replace polling triggers with webhook triggers (#7971) @danielpoonwj
  • feat: tarvent piece - update contributors (#7980) @DerekJDev

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: add cascade delete to mcp tool flow (#7992) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: handle undefined values in versionSetTwo to prevent startsWith error (#7991) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(tables): import (#7810) @amrdb

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore(deps): bump @supabase/auth-js and @supabase/supabase-js (#7878) @dependabot

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@DerekJDev, @abuaboud, @amrdb, @danielpoonwj, @dependabot, @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr
